content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Zero Trust Secure Access on-premises gateway supports consolidated FQDN for Smart Protection Network services November 18, 2024—The Zero Trust Secure Access - Internet Access On-premises Gateway now integrates the Smart Protection Network Proxy for SPN-related service connections. This reduces the number of FQDN items required for firewall exceptions. For more details refer to Firewall exception requirements for Trend Vision One . Zero Trust Secure Access → Secure Access Configuration → Internet Access and AI Service Access Configuration © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Zero Trust Secure Access on-premises gateway supports consolidated FQDN for Smart Protection Network services
